column4: hi i need to conned to different essid but my network-admin is not working can any boddy tell me how to connect to internet i am using 8.10
- sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid YOURSSID
- sudo dhclient wlan0
- if you have a WEP key then you will need to use iwconfig to set that as well.. man iwconfig
iwconfig is not working
- sudo iwconfig         what does it say?
its not changing my current essid
- sudo ifconfig        what is the list of network adapters available?  maybe you dont have wlan0
i did sudo but it says nothing but my essid always remains the same
i have eth1 i tried everything u told me
- well then its not recognizing your wireless card if all you have is eth1 probably...
- lspci, lsmod, dmesg... do you see your card in any of those?
but my internet is working
- are you plugged in through ethernet?
no i am using wireless
- sudo iwconfig... it is blank?
ya
ya its blank
- well I have no idea then.  Technically that is impossible as far as I'm concerned.
ya i know its really sounding impossible
but i am working on my wireless and i am not able to switch to another network
